subject: Basketball
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Facing off against Kansas State and its new coach, Bob Huggins, the offensively challenged Scarlet Knights began the Fred Hill era Wednesday night with a loss to the Wildcats.
snippet: Facing off against Kansas State and its new coach, Bob Huggins, the offensively challenged Scarlet Knights began the Fred Hill era Wednesday night with a loss to the Wildcats.
